entry.title: Tesla Taps MakerDAO-Powered Lender for $7.8M Real Estate Deal
entry.summary: Tesla is financing a repair center with a MakerDAO-powered loan.

entry.title: European Parliament Passes Bill Requiring Crypto Firms to KYC Non-Custodial Wallets
entry.summary: European crypto firms may soon be forced to implement KYC (Know Your Client) procedures for non-custodial wallets that they transact with.

entry.title: Polygon Taps Zero-Knowledge Proofs For New Identity Service Polygon Plans to Use ZK for New Wallet App
